text: I build scalable and responsive web applications using React.js, Vue.js, and modern backend technologies. My focus is on clean UI, secure APIs, and high-performance systems tailored for real business workflows.
I develop Progressive Web Applications (PWA) and mobile-friendly platforms that deliver seamless user experiences, offline capabilities, and optimized performance across devices.

I design and implement IoT-enabled automation solutions using MQTT, Node-RED, and Node.js, enabling real-time device communication, monitoring dashboards, and automated control systems for industrial and enterprise use cases.
